body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Joe Alexander and the customer's name is Karen Robinson.  The conversation is about MetaCar (a Car Rental Agency ) and is a conversation about customer service.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Joe Alexander, and I represent MetaCar, your go-to car rental agency.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It's great to meet you, Karen! How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling a bit frustrated with my recent rental experience.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm really sorry to hear that, Karen. Let's sort this out together. Can I have your current rental confirmation number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's four five six seven two one.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that. Could you also provide me with the last four digits of your phone number for verification?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thanks, Karen! I see your rental details now. I apologize for any inconvenience you've faced.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thanks for helping me with this.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome! Thank you for your patience, and I appreciate your time today.
